welcome: Welcome to ROCK, PAPER, SCISSORS, SPOCK & LIZARD!
instructions:
INSTRUCTIONS: To play this game, we will use the following keys:
(r) for ROCK,
(p) for PAPER,
(s) for SCISSORS,
(k) for SPOCK
(l) for LIZARD.

...The first to reach 5 is the GRAND WINNER!


=> PRESS ENTER to BEGIN
invalidEnterKey: Invalid key! Please PRESS ENTER to begin.
playerChoice: ROCK >>> PAPER >>> SCISSORS...Choose NOW!(r, p, s, k, l):
invalidChoice: That's not a valid choice. Please ENTER r, p, s, k or l:
playerWon: YOU ARE the GRAND WINNER! CONGRATULATIONS!
computerWon: I AM the GRAND WINNER! Better Luck Next Time.
anotherRound: Would you like to play another round? (Y/N)
goodbye: Thank you for playing with me...GOODBYE!
